MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH3 postcode area of Guilden Sutton, Chester, affecting properties in Arrowcroft Road and surrounding areas.  Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05PM  on 25th January 2021.
